This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Updated base Docker image to newer version
- Removed public preview labels and organization opt-in requirements for Copilot custom instructions, marking GA
- Added Copilot coding agent instructions generation via prompt
- Extended GHES 3.14 deprecation date to 2026-01-27
- Fixed GitHub CLI nested object parameter generation using JSON for complex arrays
- Removed deprecated secret scanning patterns (Airtable, Cohere, Mistral AI, Openweather API keys)
- Updated pre-release license terms to clarify non-production use restrictions
